name: Arboreal Conundrum
description: Two boys lost their ball in a tree. Maybe you could help them?

flags.name: Quest Start (Udai)
flags.description: Udai has asked for your help in getting a ball out of a tree.

flags.name: Quest Start (Ori)
flags.description: Ori has asked for your help in getting a ball out of a tree.

flags.name: Agreed to Help
flags.description: You agreed to get their ball for them, no problem.

flags.name: Ori's Idea
flags.description: Ori has given you a list of items to bring back to help you get their ball back. You need 30 feathers, some swamp mud, and a white pine log.

flags.name: Udai's Idea
flags.description: Udai has an idea for getting up the tree, but you'll need a woodworking knife.

flags.name: The Tree Is Carved
flags.description: You carved a bunch of footholds to climb the tree and get the ball. Now you just need to climb!

flags.name: Ori's Invention
flags.description: You brought back the items Ori requested. He gave you some sticky boots. This doesn't look like it's going to help...

flags.name: Ball Acquired
flags.description: You got the ball! Now you can return it to the boys. Or...

flags.name: Ball Destroyed
flags.description: You destroyed the ball. You monster.

flags.name: Sent Packing
flags.description: The boys cried and fled after you showed them their sad, deflated ball.

flags.name: A Job Well Done
flags.description: You returned the ball to the boys and there was much rejoicing.
